name: Extreme Turbo Jet Ski River
description:
Extreme Turbo Jet Ski River is quite different from other typical jet ski driving games. It will give you real experience of controlling a jetski. It is best 3D game with quality High Definition graphics and wonderful 3D environment. It is very interesting and simple game, so it can easily be played by kids.
FEATURES :
- Achieve additional points for being timely
- Outstanding controls for steering and riding the Jet Ski
- Achieve additional points for rescuing people on time before they drown
- Exciting Rescue and Driving Missions
- Enhanced 3D Graphics and Sounds
